SELECT A.seq, A.title, A.content, B.name, A.pv, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') reg_dt, IF(A.reg_dt > date_sub(now(), interval 1 day),'Y','N') dsp_new_dt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_comment C WHERE A.seq = C.board_seq) AS comment FROM board A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.id WHERE A.type = #{type}
AND (A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%') OR A.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%') OR B.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%'))
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%')
AND A.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%')
AND (A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%') OR A.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%'))
AND B.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_word},'%')
OR A.user_id NOT IN (#{user_id})
AND A.user_id IN (#{user_id})
ORDER BY A.seq DESC LIMIT #{start_row_num}, #{post_num_base_cnt}

SELECT A.seq, A.title, A.content, A.user_id, B.name, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') reg_dt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_comment C WHERE A.seq = C.board_seq) AS comment, (SELECT D.title FROM board D WHERE D.type= A.type AND D.seq < #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1) AS prev_page_title, (SELECT D.title FROM board D WHERE D.type= A.type AND D.seq > #{seq} ORDER BY seq ASC LIMIT 1) AS next_page_title, (SELECT D.seq FROM board D WHERE D.type= A.type AND D.seq < #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1) AS prev_seq, (SELECT D.seq FROM board D WHERE D.type= A.type AND D.seq > #{seq} ORDER BY seq ASC LIMIT 1) AS next_seq FROM board A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.id WHERE A.type = #{type} AND A.seq = #{seq} ORDER BY A.seq DESC

insert.if: INSERT INTO board (type, title, content, user_id, pv, show_yn, reg_dt) VALUES (#{type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{user_id}, #{pv}, #{show_yn}, NOW())

mapper.insert: UPDATE board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_dt = NOW() WHERE seq = #{seq}
